idea-plugin.name: Base16 Railscasts
idea-plugin.vendor: Ryan Bates (http://railscasts.com), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Railscasts for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Ryan Bates (http://railscasts.com). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
